data.actual_result: The user card module is randomely removed, but will stay if the user is being granted a role that isn't listed past the section you've scrolled to in the Guilds member list.
data.expected_result: The module will stay open, even though the user is placed past the member list area you're currently scrolled to.
data.short_description: In a heavily populated server with lots of roles; add someone to a role that's placed higher than their current placement in the channel. The user card will vanish, instead of staying open.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a user in a heavily populated server with lots of roles being displayed separately from regular users. - Give the user a tag that's placed higher than the area you're currently scrolled to in the member list of the guild. - Give the user the role and watch the module vanish.
